thread.section_title: TicketCity Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TicketCity | www.ticketcity.com | 4 of 289
thread.title: Nihada

author: Nihada
title: Nihada
text: The company itself was great to work with however my experience was awful. Bought tickets to a jlo concert in Vegas on 1/26 was charged a $15fee per ticket on top of the price of the tickets. I didn't get the tickets had to keep calling back for them multiple times everytime I was told I'd get them by the end of the week. The concert was on 2/22 on 2/19 I called and finically they got a hold of the seller who then emailed me my tickets ! I have never had such an awful experience no reason I should have had to wait a month for the tickets !
